message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $9,000 is simply not enough for me.  How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $10,500. It's still a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. Can you consider going down to $9,800? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

Bob, I understand you're trying to work within your budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $9,800.  Let's meet in the middle one more time. I'm willing to come down to $10,150. This is my final offer, so let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit short. Can you consider going down to $9,900? I'm willing to make one more concession to get this deal done.
